member.name: M:Amazon.DateTime.Calculators.DateTimeCalculator.DaylightStartDate(System.DateTime)
member.summary:
Daylight Savings starts on the Second Sunday in March at 2am
https://greenwichmeantime.com/time-zone/rules/usa/

member.name: M:Amazon.DateTime.Calculators.DateTimeCalculator.DaylightEndDate(System.DateTime)
member.summary:
Daylight Savings ends on the First Sunday in November at 2am
https://greenwichmeantime.com/time-zone/rules/usa/

member.name: M:Amazon.DateTime.Calculators.DateTimeCalculator.IsInDaylightSavingsTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary:
Figures out if the current date time falls inside Daylight savings time
https://greenwichmeantime.com/time-zone/rules/usa/
